last_episode_to_air.name: The Island Family
last_episode_to_air.overview: Barricaded in the mansion and surrounded by the rich, the survivors mount one last attempt to escape Declan's island.

name: Wrecked
overview: Single-camera comedy centering on a diverse group of survivors adjusting to being stranded on an uninhabited island, a dangerous new world where they must face many threats – mostly brought on by themselves. No longer plugged into the rest of the world, the group struggles to navigate their makeshift society while also learning to live without such modern comforts as indoor plumbing, Wi-Fi, social media and Chipotle.

episodes.name: All Is Not Lost
episodes.overview: A British ex-special forces agent leads a rescue mission after a commercial flight crashes on an uninhabited island. The survivors make a discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: Rest in Peace, Callaway Hinkle
episodes.overview: The survivors find a satellite phone, Danny confronts his past, Todd learns about the death of his child, and a discovery is made that could change everything.

episodes.name: Always Meant to See That
episodes.overview: Pack, Emma, and Florence face a tough choice and the survivors make a discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: The Community Pile
episodes.overview: Pack goes on a vision quest, Danny helps Owen relax, Todd makes a power play to take control, and the survivors make a discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: Tubthumping
episodes.overview: The survivors hold an election, Danny and Todd face off, and the survivors make a discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: The Phantom
episodes.overview: Todd adjusts to a life of solitude, Pack finds other crash survivors, and the survivors make a discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: The survivors hold a trial after someone is seriously injured and the survivors make a discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: The Adventures of Beth and Lamar
episodes.overview: Danny and Owen start a new camp, two survivors try to escape the island, and the survivors make a discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: Javier and the Gang
episodes.overview: Owen has an encounter in the jungle. Todd, Florence, and Emma adjust to life off the island and the survivors make a discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: Cop Tricks
episodes.overview: The survivors make a discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: Ransom
episodes.overview: The newly arrived pirates try to ransom Danny while marooning the others. Steve tries to make amends for murdering a survivor.

episodes.name: Poison
episodes.overview: After the pirates decide to stay on the island, Pack tries to negotiate a truce. Steve pitches Danny on a new business venture.

episodes.name: Caiman
episodes.overview: After something taints the water upstream, Florence and Karen hike into the jungle to find the source while the others debate whether they want the pirates to spoil “Game of Thrones.” Steve strikes up an unlikely romance.

episodes.name: Tony Pepperoni
episodes.overview: Owen and Florence deal with the return of a deadly foe. Todd makes a haunting discovery about his past after trying to fist fight Chet. I guess Owen is the captain now. Or maybe Florence again? Hard to say.

episodes.name: No One Rides for Free
episodes.overview: Jess & Todd attempt to buy passage on the pirate's ship through unconventional means. Owen starts to have feelings for Florence, as Steve grapples with his new love. Jess and Todd are both the captains now, like a sort of dual-captain scenario.

episodes.name: Sister Mercy
episodes.overview: After discovering the pirate's plan to harvest their organs, the survivors attempt to escape the island. Karen must make a difficult decision that echoes a moment from her past. Will the pirates remain the captains now?

episodes.name: Cruise-ifornication
episodes.overview: After making it onto the pirate's ship (a Red Hot Chili Peppers tribute band cruise), the survivors divide after only some of them get showers. Pack and Bruce form an unlikely friendship.

episodes.name: Speed
episodes.overview: After Todd and Jess decide to get married, Florence and Owen struggle to define their new romance. Casey returns to officiate the wedding. Pack and Steve make a discovery that threatens to tear them apart.

episodes.name: The Setup
episodes.overview: Danny launches an investigation after the survivors discover someone has sabotaged the ship by blowing up the engine. Steve makes a shocking discovery at the bottom of the ship. Honestly, no one is the captain now.

episodes.name: Nerd Speak
episodes.overview: As the ship sinks, the survivors attempt to escape. Will anyone be the captain now ever again?

episodes.name: Bush Man
episodes.overview: After surviving the Cruisifornication explosion and washing ashore on a new island, the survivors uncover a menacing threat, begging the question -- wait, does anyone actually read these episode descriptions?

episodes.name: Puke & Cigars
episodes.overview: After a charismatic millionaire rescues the survivors, Jess and Florence suspect he may not be what he seems, and set out to answer the question -- who is Declan Stanwick? And more importantly, who is reading this? Anyone?

episodes.name: Six Feet
episodes.overview: After discovering Declan's sinister plot, Danny goes undercover with the rich, while Pack and Karen attempt to escape the compound. I wish we could escape writing these episode descriptions, am I right? No one actually reads these, right?

episodes.name: A Game of Chest
episodes.overview: After Jess loses her recollection of the last decade, Todd attempts to spark her memory. Steve and Declan face off in a battle of wits.

episodes.name: Last Meal
episodes.overview: On the eve of The Hunt, Martha offers to the survivors' one last meal of their choosing -- as long as they can all decide together.

episodes.name: Hunt Day
episodes.overview: It's Hunt Day, and the survivors must face off against each other in a battle royale to the death.

episodes.name: Ballers
episodes.overview: Attempting to hide from the others during The Hunt, Pack and Jess run into a new threat on the island.

episodes.name: The Dark Prince Returns
episodes.overview: With Karen gravely injured, Owen and Danny must journey to the center of the island to defeat Chettywompwomp. Florence learns more about Karen's backstory. Pack, Todd and Jess face a futile task.

episodes.name: Mrs. Stanwick
episodes.overview: The survivors attempt to turn the tables on the rich and lure them into a trap.

episodes.name: The Island Family
episodes.overview: Barricaded in the mansion and surrounded by the rich, the survivors mount one last attempt to escape Declan's island.
